Author: HarryHardying
Text: I had both and it was honestly the best lunch I’ve had in awhile. I might do that everyday except monster energies and protein bars aren’t cheap. But I didn’t feel completely dead after and actually felt full. ‘‘Twas amazing.

Author: digiskunk
Text: Why not both, hmmm?  As somebody who's making an attempt at recovery, I can tell you one thing: It can be difficult to make such adjustments—especially after restricting for so long.  I'm currently attempting to eat more and although it can be difficult at times, I'm still trying. I still have my bad habits, and I'm aware of that, but at least I'm making some progress. You just have to make baby steps toward a better tomorrow.  Have both the protein bar and the Monster. The protein bar is easily more important though.
